TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceView extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceView

summary.span: 支援 控制項，並提供資料繫結控制項的介面，以執行 LINQ 資料作業。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要為了用於資料繫結控制項，而不是網頁程式碼中的可程式化物件。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 網頁程式開發人員通常會使用與資料互動的控制項。Page developers typically use the control to interact with data. ASP.NET 資料來源控制項包含一個或多個資料來源檢視物件所代表的資料清單。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 類別會擴充類別。The class extends the class. 它會定義各種控制項與它相關聯，而且它會實作資料來源控制項的基本資料功能。It defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 類別會實作，[更新]()，[插入]()，以及[刪除]()作業。The class implements the , [Update](), [Insert](), and [Delete]() operations. 此外，它也會實作排序、 篩選和管理會保留在檢視狀態的設定。It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 雖然物件不會直接暴露給頁面開發人員，可以透過存取其屬性和方法的許多控制項。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the control. 控制項實作的下列資料擷取方法和事件並將其公開網頁開發人員，並透過相關聯的其他呼叫端控制項：The control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated control: - 屬性。The property. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. 您可以排序的資料，您使用擷取加上的控制項`OrderBy`子句。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an `OrderBy` clause. 您可以提供的排序運算式執行個體，藉由設定屬性物件傳遞至方法。You can provide a sort expression for the instance by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 語法屬性是相同的語法屬性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 控制實作介面並使用檢視來追蹤其狀態跨網頁要求的狀態。The control implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 實作屬性和， ，和方法，以啟用控制項檢視狀態追蹤。Implementations of the property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會呼叫[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法，以傳回具有指定的資料來源檢視的新執行個體`name`參數。The constructor is called by the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 只有一個物件相關聯控制項一次。Only one object is associated with a control at a time. 名稱物件會永遠`DefaultView`，雖然此命名限制所加諸控制項，不是控制項。The name of the object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not by the control. 您可以覆寫[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法，以支援使用不同的命名慣例的檢視。You can override the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to support views that use a different naming convention. 方式傳遞的執行個體`context`參數用來存取的參數集合的資料來源檢視。The instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.

summary.span: 取得值，表示與目前 控制項關聯的 物件是否支援對擷取的資料進行分頁。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging of retrieved data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件一律支援分頁，即使資料展示控制項不會使用分頁。The object always supports paging even if the data presentation control does not use paging. 當[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()屬性設定為`false`，您可以手動一頁中的資料事件。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRetrieveTotalRowCount As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示與目前 控制項關聯的 物件除了支援擷取資料之外，是否還支援擷取資料列的總數。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項使用可分頁來決定如何呈現分頁控制項的資料列的總數。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 比方說，這個值用來判斷多少的數字頁面巡覽區按鈕，來呈現在控制頁面巡覽區。For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如果[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()屬性設定為`false`，您必須手動設定的資料列總數事件。If the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要是由.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). `LoadViewState`方法會還原檢視狀態資訊中所儲存的先前頁面要求物件方法。The `LoadViewState` method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來， 控制項之檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含對 控制項檢視狀態進行之變更或 null (Visual Basic 中沒有任何項目) 的物件 (如果沒有任何檢視狀態與物件建立關聯)。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the control's view state, or null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SaveViewState`方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The `SaveViewState` method is primarily used by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 這些值會自動加入至屬性的伺服器控制項，也就是執行個體的: System.Web.UI.StateBag > 類別。These values are automatically added to the property of the server control, which is an instance of the :System.Web.UI.StateBag> class. 伺服器控制項再保存到字串物件的伺服器控制項生命週期的儲存狀態階段之後的值。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 當檢視狀態儲存，保存伺服器控制項生命週期的儲存狀態階段轉譯至瀏覽器的 HTML 隱藏項目之後的字串物件。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle is rendered to the browser as an HTML hidden element. 當您建立自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率`SaveViewState`方法，並修改`ViewState`伺服器控制項的屬性。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the `SaveViewState` method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

related.span: LinqDataSource Web 伺服器控制項概觀
